name: Build That Cabin
description:
Ludum Dare 45 submission. Made in 3 days, please be kind :P

Try to beat your best time. You have to find the Axe in the level to chop down wood. You have to find the Cabin Plans in the level and place it down to start building it. 10 wood is required per Floor, Walls, and Roof. A Fishing Pole can be found in the level so you can fish at the Frozen Lake for food.

P.S. Bears don't like cold feet
